desc: This advanced Chinese language course aims to develop students' language proficiency and introduce students to various aspects of contemporary Chinese social life and culture. Course materials include films with excerpts of written scripts, newspapers, television, and essays related to the unit topics. Classroom activities include lectures, language drills, discussions, debates, presentations, and performances. Prerequisite: Chinese 302 or permission of instructor.
name: Chinese Lang/Soc/Media
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Chinese 302 or permission of instructor.
title: Chinese Language and Society through the Media
